servicediscovery
Class Service

java.lang.Object
  servicediscovery.Service

public class Service
extends Object

this is the service class. Each service has got a unique service ID, a service type, a list of actions that it supports and a list of triggers that it has listeners on It also has a various properties associated with the service.

Author:
parth

getActions

public Map<String,Action> getActions()
returns all the actions of a particular service

Returns:
a Map of string-Action. The key of this map is the action tag and the value is the action object stored in the service.

getTriggers

public Map<String,Trigger> getTriggers()
returns all the triggers of a particular service is listening for

Returns:
a Map of string-Trigger. The key of this map is the trigger name and the value is the trigger object stored in the service.
